Class Reflection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.jonathanxd.iutils.reflection.Reflection

  • public final class Reflection
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void changeFinalField(java.lang.Class<?> aClass, java.lang.Object instance, java.lang.String fieldName, java.lang.Object newValue)
      Changes a final (or static final) field of a class.
      static <T> T getInstance(java.lang.Class<T> type)
      Gets the singleton instance of a type, this requires that the class have a public static INSTANCE field of the same type as enclosing type (type in this case) or is annotated with Singleton that specifies the name of singleton field.
      static <T> T value(java.lang.Class<T> tClass, java.lang.Object value)
      Tries to gets a instance of tClass using a valueOf and parse method.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static <T> T getInstance(java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Gets the singleton instance of a type, this requires that the class have a public static INSTANCE field of the same type as enclosing type (type in this case) or is annotated with Singleton that specifies the name of singleton field.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Class type.
        Parameters:
        type - Type to get singleton instance.
        Returns:
        Singleton instance of type.

      • changeFinalField

        public static void changeFinalField(java.lang.Class<?> aClass,
                                    java.lang.Object instance,
                                    java.lang.String fieldName,
                                    java.lang.Object newValue)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Changes a final (or static final) field of a class.
        Parameters:
        aClass - Class.
        instance - Class object instance.
        fieldName - Field name.
        newValue - New value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If an exception occurs when trying to change the value.

      • value

        public static <T> T value(java.lang.Class<T> tClass,
                          java.lang.Object value)
        Tries to gets a instance of tClass using a valueOf and parse method.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type.
        Parameters:
        value - Value to pass to valueOf and parse method.
        Returns:
        Value, or null if cannot find a valueOf or a parse method.
